  • Characteristics Groups / Characteristics Group Hierarchy
  • View page source

Characteristics Groups / Characteristics Group HierarchyÂ¶

The data that enables navigation to the class lists of characteristics from the menu tree or from the CLC structure catalog is generated from the entries in the characteristics group hierarchy. The smfm properties can be used to set the identifier for characteristics groups in the application area.

Important

After modifying the smfm property, the characteristics group hierarchy must be generated again in order for the modifications to take effect in the entire application area.
